pkgmetadata.longdescription: CAnopy IMage ANalysis // Classify hemispherical photographs of the plant canopy with algorithms specially developed for such a task and well documented in Daz and Lencinas (2015) doi:10.1109/lgrs.2015.2425931 and Daz and Lencinas (2018) doi:10.1139/cjfr-2018-0006. It supports non-circular hemispherical photography, such as those acquired with 15mm lenses or with auxiliary fish-eye lenses attached to mobile devices. For smartphone-based hemispherical photography see Daz (2023) doi:10.1111/2041-210x.14059. Most of the functions also support restricted view photography.
